Shipping information

Most orders are processed, engraved and shipped out within a 2-4 week period, (10 - 20 business days (M-F)). Shipping times will vary depending on the carrier selected. Engraving Times are an ESTIMATE and are not guaranteed, the amount of orders ahead of your order will affect your time line. Please keep in mind that every order has to be produced and not taken off a shelf. Some orders may take less time and some orders may take more time. We will select the most cost effective shipping method unless you direct otherwise.We use USPS Priority Mail, UPS, and FedEx services. PLEASE NOTE: The approximate engraving times above are to be used as guidelines and are estimates of the time needed to complete your order before shipping, they are NOT GUARANTEED engraving times and can take longer depending on order volume.
